I like this. Very pleasing to the eye.

I'm always on the lookout for cheap functions that emulate SSS, and your "subsurface" function seems to work nicely... I haven't tried it on other surfaces, but it works well here. I like it the way it looks already, but replacing "d = normalize(v - n)" with something like "d = refract(v, n, 1./1.5)" could add some subtle variance by bringing some light bending into play.
woooooooow, this is super super cool!
